meanings.definition: The ability or power to conduct or transmit heat, electricity, or sound.
meanings.sent1: The conductivities of metals make them good conductors of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The conductivities of different materials vary depending on their composition.
meanings.sent3: The conductivities of the wires seemed to have a mind of their own, creating a symphony of electrical currents.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of music was like the conductivities of a skilled conductor, effortlessly guiding the flow of sound.
meanings.sent5: The conductivities of the metal rods were so high that they could quickly transfer heat from one end to the other.
